title: Dear Riot, Where is my premium chest?
body: Hey, i heard from a friend that when you get lvl 5, you get a premium chest, and i dont have one... Is there any place i can get this or achieve it to get the chest? thanks riot games! :D. by the way im lvl 5

replies.body:
The level 5 chest can sometimes experience a *slight delay* hitting your account. Give it a few hours after you've hit level 5 and if you still don't see if by tomorrow, hit us up in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
